mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_blog_00 (id, title, summary, createTime, type, blogType, viewCount, commentCount, context, summaryImg, contextImg) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{summary}, #{createTime}, #{type}, #{blogType}, #{viewCount}, #{commentCount}, #{context}, #{summaryImg}, #{contextImg});
mapper.update: UPDATE t_blog_00 set viewCount = viewCount+1 where id=#{id}

UPDATE t_blog_00
title=#{title},
summary=#{summary},
createTime=#{createTime},
type=#{type},
blogType=#{blogType},
viewCount=#{viewCount},
commentCount=#{commentCount},
context=#{context},
summaryImg=#{summaryImg},
contextImg=#{contextImg},
WHERE (id=#{id});
mapper.select: SELECT id,title,summary,createTime,summaryImg,type,viewCount,context FROM t_blog_00 ORDER BY createTime DESC LIMIT #{begin},#{rows}
SELECT id,title,summaryImg FROM t_blog_00 WHERE id = #{id}
